examples: She stopped the car opposite the school.
The CEO is meeting her opposite number at Fukuda Electronics to discuss a possible joint venture.
The Foreign Secretary is currently having talks with his opposite number in the White House.
He was proud to be playing opposite a famous actor.
Do you agree that the opposite side of the coin is too often untold?
words.defineEn: on the other side of an area when seen from a particular vantage point
words.defineVi: ở phía bên kia của một khu vực khi nhìn từ một điểm thuận lợi cụ thể

examples: The slow train arrived at the station behind schedule.
Has the train from Bristol arrived?
The fast train arrived at the destination in no time.
Replies to the advertisement are arriving in fits and starts.
The elevator arrived after a couple of minutes of waiting.
words.defineEn: to reach a location, particularly as an end to a journey
words.defineVi: để đạt được một địa điểm, đặc biệt là kết thúc một cuộc hành trình

examples: The library closes early on Sundays.
She sent the kids to bed early.
Her early research laid the foundation for many important medical discoveries.
Book early and save £50!
For some people, early morning jogging is their cup of tea.
words.defineEn: happening or done before the usual, expected, or scheduled time
words.defineVi: xảy ra hoặc thực hiện trước thời gian thông thường, dự kiến, hoặc theo lịch trình

examples: Their approach to sports teaching broke the mold.
The movie broke all box-office records.
The movie broke box office records in the US.
The bag broke under the weight of the bottles inside it.
My watch has broken.
words.defineEn: to separate something into more pieces, often in a sudden way
words.defineVi: để tách một cái gì đó thành nhiều mảnh hơn, thường là một cách đột ngột

examples: Will you get the phone?
Your phone is ringing for the thousandth time.
The phone rang and broke my train of thought.
I have my phone to thank for my lack of sleep last night.
The phone lead isn’t long enough to reach the bedroom.
words.defineEn: an electronic device used to talk to a person who is at a different location
words.defineVi: một thiết bị điện tử được sử dụng để nói chuyện với một người đang ở một địa điểm khác

examples: My dad bought a stylish suit for his friend's wedding.
The rich man bought a big house and a fancy car.
We bought a bag of coarse sea salt from the specialty store.
She bought an expensive dress for a special occasion.
I bought a pound of fresh meat from the butcher.
words.defineEn: to get something in exchange for paying money
words.defineVi: để có được một cái gì đó để đổi lấy việc trả tiền

examples: The police searched the suspect's house for evidence.
Houses that suits every pocket.
The house looks east.
Better one house spoiled than two.
The singer always brings the house down with her powerful voice and stage presence.
words.defineEn: a building where people live, especially as a family
words.defineVi: một tòa nhà nơi mọi người sống, đặc biệt là như một gia đình

examples: She downloaded a new movie to watch on her laptop during the flight.
He downloaded a new app to help with productivity.
She downloaded a new album and is excited to listen to the new music.
We have made the necessary documents available for download on our website.
The tech company developed a new app, confident that 'if you build it, they will come' and download it to use for their everyday needs.
words.defineEn: to add data to a computer from the Internet or another computer
words.defineVi: để thêm dữ liệu vào máy tính từ Internet hoặc máy tính khác

examples: Alice's song hits the airwaves.
That song always sends a shiver down my spine.
Fans have given the band's new song their seal of approval.
That band's new song is really off the hook!
She bought the painting for a song.
words.defineEn: a piece of music that has words
words.defineVi: một bản nhạc có lời

examples: Find a hobby.
After all, love will find a way.
Water will always find its own level.
She found a dirty stain on her favorite shirt.
The court found in her favor.
words.defineEn: to discover or get back something or someone that we had lost, after searching for it or them
words.defineVi: để khám phá hoặc lấy lại một cái gì đó hoặc ai đó mà chúng tôi đã mất, sau khi tìm kiếm nó hoặc họ

examples: The author abstracted key themes from the novel in her literary analysis.
The keys are kept in my office.
I turned the key in the lock.
He turned the key in the lock.
The piano keys are black and white.
words.defineEn: a specially shaped piece of metal used for locking or unlocking a door, starting a car, etc.
words.defineVi: một miếng kim loại có hình dạng đặc biệt được sử dụng để khóa hoặc mở khóa cửa, khởi động ô tô, v.v.

examples: We can't forget the limburger cheese!

I forgot my umbrella, and now I'm getting wet in the rain.
Don't forget to bring your books with you.
Don't forget to sprinkle some shredded cheese on the pizza as a tasty topping.
words.defineEn: to not be able to remember something or someone from the past
words.defineVi: để không thể nhớ một cái gì đó hoặc ai đó từ quá khứ

examples: Put your name here.

The machine takes its name from its inventor.
The name rings a bell.
Your name is mud, sonny!
words.defineEn: the word someone or something is called or known by
words.defineVi: từ ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó được gọi hoặc biết bởi

examples: Lend an ear and listen to my version.
Can you lend me your red pen to fill out this form?
She lends her pencil to a classmate who forgot to bring one.
If Laura damages the car, her dad won't lend it to her again.
You'll lend him some, since you can afford to make ducks and drakes of it.
words.defineEn: to allow someone to have or use something that you own which must be returned to you later
words.defineVi: để cho phép ai đó có hoặc sử dụng một cái gì đó mà bạn sở hữu mà phải được trả lại cho bạn sau này

examples: The business is losing money.
Money can't buy happiness.
Money means nothing to him.
A lot of people give money to good causes.
My parents give me pocket money every week.
words.defineEn: something that people use to buy and sell goods and services, can be in the form of coins or paper bills
words.defineVi: thứ mà mọi người sử dụng để mua và bán hàng hóa và dịch vụ, có thể ở dạng tiền xu hoặc hóa đơn giấy

examples: After all, love will find a way.
He loved gardening.
They loved the sun-dried tomato and mozzarella-filled pansotti.
I love the vibrant green color of Granny Smith apples.
I love the crunch of romaine lettuce in my sandwiches.
words.defineEn: to have very strong feelings for someone or something that is important to us and we like a lot and want to take care of
words.defineVi: có tình cảm rất mãnh liệt với ai đó hoặc điều gì đó quan trọng đối với chúng ta và chúng ta rất thích và muốn chăm sóc

examples: Cooking is just not Emma's thing.
Knowledge of cooking comes easy to him.
She seasoned the meat with herbs and spices before cooking.
Apparently, Meg's cooking leaves a lot to be desired.
You can leave the cooking to me.
words.defineEn: the act of preparing food by heat or mixing different ingredients
words.defineVi: hành động chuẩn bị thức ăn bằng nhiệt hoặc trộn các thành phần khác nhau

examples: He never missed a televised basketball or football game.
I missed the part where that's my problem.
but we missed them.
She received a missed call from an unknown phone number.
You've missed your mark three times in a row.
words.defineEn: to not hit or touch what was aimed at
words.defineVi: để không đánh hoặc chạm vào những gì đã được nhằm vào

examples: The train’s here at long last.

Trains between London and Brighton run throughout the day.
To hold the train.
The slow train arrived at the station behind schedule.
words.defineEn: a series of connected carriages or wagons pulled along a railroad line by a locomotive
words.defineVi: một loạt các toa xe hoặc toa xe được kết nối với nhau do đầu máy kéo dọc theo một tuyến đường sắt

examples: The days passed slowly.
The time passed quickly.
The day and night passed slowly.
The feeling of sickness soon passed.
Unemployment has now passed the three million mark.
words.defineEn: to get the necessary grades in an exam, test, course, etc.
words.defineVi: để đạt điểm cần thiết trong một kỳ thi, bài kiểm tra, khóa học, v.v.

examples: She shares her eraser with her classmates during exams.
I always get the jitters before exams.
I always get butterflies before an exam.
You may turn over your exam papers now.
It's an easy exam.
words.defineEn: a way of testing how much someone knows about a subject
words.defineVi: một cách kiểm tra xem ai đó biết bao nhiêu về một chủ đề

examples: He picked up a beautiful head of savoy cabbage from the market.
They picked up the check for dinner last night.
Whenever we go out, my father picks up the tab.
The city had to pick up the pieces after a major storm caused widespread damage and power outages.
He picked up the new language easily by listening to podcasts.
words.defineEn: to take and lift something up
words.defineVi: để lấy và nâng một cái gì đó lên

examples: Airport security was extra tight in the wake of yesterday's bomb attacks.
My mother drove us to the airport.
The taxi driver drove us to the airport quickly and safely.
The closing of the airport knocked our holiday plans on the head.
The journey to the airport takes about half an hour.
words.defineEn: a large place where planes take off and land, with buildings and other facilities, in which passengers wait for their flights
words.defineVi: một nơi rộng rãi, nơi máy bay cất cánh và hạ cánh, với các tòa nhà và cơ sở vật chất khác, trong đó hành khách đợi chuyến bay của họ

examples: She pushed the stroller along the path in the park.
They pushed the heavy box across the room.
The weight of the world pushed him to his knees.
She pushed the cart down the aisle at the grocery store.
The new product design pushes the limits of what is currently available on the market.
words.defineEn: to use our hands, arms, body, etc. in order to make something or someone move forward or away from us
words.defineVi: sử dụng bàn tay, cánh tay, cơ thể của chúng ta, v.v. để làm cho một cái gì đó hoặc ai đó di chuyển về phía trước hoặc ra xa chúng ta

examples: Close the door, please.
Which door leads to the yard?
right on cue the door opened
That accident battered up the door of my car.
The driver of the car opened the car door for the passengers.
words.defineEn: the thing we move to enter, exit, or access a place such as a vehicle, building, room, etc.
words.defineVi: thứ chúng ta di chuyển để vào, ra hoặc tiếp cận một địa điểm như xe cộ, tòa nhà, phòng, v.v.

examples: That song always sends a shiver down my spine.
Anne's aunt always sends her birthday cards and gifts.
I sent the package by airmail.
He sent me a copy of his new book.
She sent the kids to bed early.
words.defineEn: to take something to a specific location or making arrangements for it to be taken there, particularly by post
words.defineVi: để đưa một cái gì đó đến một địa điểm cụ thể hoặc sắp xếp để nó được đưa đến đó, đặc biệt là qua đường bưu điện

examples: The email went to everyone in the company.
I don't send emails blowing smoke up their asses.
I received an automated email from the accountant saying that she was out to lunch.
My coworker put her foot in it when she accidentally sent an email to the wrong person.
In the past, it was common to send handwritten letters but nowadays email is the preferred method of communication, other times, other manners.
words.defineEn: a digital message that is sent from one person to another person or group of people using a system called email
words.defineVi: một tin nhắn kỹ thuật số được gửi từ một người đến một người khác hoặc một nhóm người sử dụng một hệ thống gọi là email

examples: What time does the show start?
Start the engines!
The school semester starts next month.
Who started the fire?
The trail starts just outside the town.
words.defineEn: to begin doing or using something that we were not doing or using before, and continue doing or using it
words.defineVi: để bắt đầu làm hoặc sử dụng một cái gì đó mà chúng tôi đã không làm hoặc sử dụng trước đó và tiếp tục làm hoặc sử dụng nó

examples: The fast runner won the race by a wide margin.

My people have a horse in this race, too.

You lost the race faster than you can say Jack Robinson.
words.defineEn: a competition between people, vehicles, animals, etc. to find out which one is the fastest and finishes first
words.defineVi: cuộc thi giữa người, xe cộ, động vật, v.v. để xem ai nhanh nhất và về đích trước

examples: That will teach them a lesson!
My brother taught me the best way to cook spuds over the campfire.
She teaches yoga to promote health and well-being.
My sister is teaching her dog to sit and stay.
He taught himself to play the violin.
words.defineEn: to instruct or educate someone; to give lessons to students in a university, college, school, etc.
words.defineVi: để hướng dẫn hoặc giáo dục ai đó; để giảng bài cho sinh viên trong một trường đại học, cao đẳng, trường học, v.v.

examples: Maths error casts doubts on Greater Cambridge Partnership's road.
She studied different subjects in school, from math to history.

Can you explain this math concept to me?
We study different subjects like math, science, and English at school.
words.defineEn: a type of science that deals with shapes, space, and numbers
words.defineVi: một loại khoa học liên quan đến hình dạng, không gian và số

examples: If the child doesn't get what he wants, he immediately turns on the waterworks.

words.defineEn: to cause a machine, device, or equipment to operate, typically by pushing a button or turning a key
words.defineVi: để làm cho máy móc, thiết bị hoặc thiết bị hoạt động, thường bằng cách nhấn nút hoặc xoay chìa khóa

examples: Cable TV reaches a huge audience.
The TV quiz was more fun than a barrel of monkeys!

words.defineEn: an electronic device that shows images and videos and plays sounds and people use to watch different programs
words.defineVi: một thiết bị điện tử hiển thị hình ảnh và video và phát âm thanh và mọi người sử dụng để xem các chương trình khác nhau

examples: Three cheers for Sarah, whose brilliant goal at the last minute won us the game!

Which team won?
The proposal has won the approval of the city council.
Our team actually won!
words.defineEn: to become the most successful, the luckiest, or the best in a game, race, fight, etc.
words.defineVi: để trở thành người thành công nhất, may mắn nhất hoặc giỏi nhất trong một trò chơi, cuộc đua, cuộc chiến, v.v.

examples: The striped socks matched perfectly with his striped shirt.
Fifty thousand people saw the match.

They had a friendly soccer match with their friends in the park.
words.defineEn: a competition in which two players or teams compete against one another such as soccer, boxing, etc.
words.defineVi: một cuộc thi trong đó hai cầu thủ hoặc đội thi đấu với nhau như bóng đá, đấm bốc, v.v.

examples: Eve borrows money to buy expensive designer clothes - champagne taste on a beer budget!
They can borrow them for as long as they need them.
My roommate asked me if she could borrow a zucchini to make a zucchini bread.
I decided to borrow a leaf out of his book and invest some money in the stock market.
I’ve got money you can borrow if you run out.
words.defineEn: to use or take something that someone else owns, which must be given back to them later on
words.defineVi: sử dụng hoặc lấy thứ gì đó mà người khác sở hữu, sau này phải trả lại cho họ

examples: The film caught a cold over the outstanding debt.

The new law caught them unawares.
He caught a glimpse of his reflection in the glass.
As she turned back, a movement across the lawn caught her eye.
words.defineEn: to stop and hold an object that is moving through the air by hands
words.defineVi: để dừng lại và giữ một đối tượng đang di chuyển trong không khí bằng tay

examples: We drop off our son at preschool in the morning and pick him up in the afternoon.

Oh, that one dropped off.
And truckloads of tuna are dropped off every hour.
words.defineEn: to take a person or thing to a predetermined location and leave afterwards
words.defineVi: để đưa một người hoặc vật đến một địa điểm được xác định trước và rời đi sau đó

examples: The project failed for the want of adequate funding.
Words are failing me right now.

words.defineEn: to be unsuccessful in accomplishing something
words.defineVi: không thành công trong việc hoàn thành một cái gì đó

examples: The team finished the race in first place.
You just finished your book?
She finishes her piano practice at 7 o'clock.
I've finished my work.
She always finishes her work assignments by the end of the week.
words.defineEn: to make something end
words.defineVi: để làm cho một cái gì đó kết thúc

examples: 95 per cent of the UK can now get superfast broadband.
This room gets very little sunshine.
Get a load of that dress Mag!

The police got wind of the illegal drug deal.
words.defineEn: to receive or come to have something
words.defineVi: để nhận hoặc đến để có một cái gì đó

examples: That guy really hates my guts.

words.defineEn: to really not like something or someone
words.defineVi: để thực sự không thích một cái gì đó hoặc một ai đó

examples: To learn a language/skill/trade.

She learns about the laws of physics and the properties of matter in her science lessons.

words.defineEn: to gain knowledge of or skill in something by experience, by study, or by being taught
words.defineVi: để đạt được kiến thức hoặc kỹ năng trong một cái gì đó bằng kinh nghiệm, nghiên cứu, hoặc bằng cách được dạy

examples: His partner left the table in a fit of pique.
The spicy beef jerky left a smoky aftertaste in my mouth.

Leaves change colour in autumn.
The intense gaze from across the room, eyes on stalks, left no doubt about his attraction.
words.defineEn: to go away from somewhere or someone
words.defineVi: đi khỏi một nơi nào đó hoặc một ai đó

examples: That shot lost him the championship.
lose that creep!
His carelessness lost him the job.
The government has lost control of the city.
The business is losing money.
words.defineEn: to be deprived of or stop having someone or something
words.defineVi: bị tước đoạt hoặc ngừng có một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó

examples: Liza mended her fences by making amends with his family.
The two neighbors mend fences by discussing their concerns and finding common ground.
With the help of a therapist, the couple is on the mend and is working through the challenges in their relationship.
After a few days of rest and medication, Emily is on the mend and expects to be back to work soon.
After a series of setbacks and missteps, the team regrouped and found themselves on the mend, with a renewed sense of purpose and a clear plan for moving forward.
words.defineEn: to fix something that is damaged or broken so it can work or be used again
words.defineVi: để sửa chữa một cái gì đó bị hư hỏng hoặc bị hỏng để nó có thể hoạt động hoặc được sử dụng lại

examples: She always pulls her weight.
Uh, I was just pulling your chain, man.
The caterer really pulled a rabbit out of a hat by producing 100 cupcakes with just 20 minutes' notice.
She pulls a face at her brother whenever he teases her.
She pulled her suitcase behind her as she walked through the airport.
words.defineEn: to use our hands to move something or someone toward us or in the direction that our hands are moving
words.defineVi: sử dụng bàn tay của chúng tôi để di chuyển một cái gì đó hoặc ai đó về phía chúng tôi hoặc theo hướng mà bàn tay của chúng tôi đang di chuyển

examples: The young actress received an award for her outstanding performance.
The film received lavish praise from critics for its groundbreaking visual effects, compelling storyline, and outstanding performances.
Offenders should receive their just deserts.
The hardworking employee received a promotion for their exceptional performance.
She received a missed call from an unknown phone number.
words.defineEn: to be given something or to accept something that is sent
words.defineVi: để được đưa ra một cái gì đó hoặc để chấp nhận một cái gì đó được gửi

examples: Always remember that.
I'll always remember this holiday.
He couldn't remember the name of the movie for the life of him.
Remember Jackson.
I don't remember my first day at school.
words.defineEn: to bring a type of information from the past to our mind again
words.defineVi: để đưa một loại thông tin từ quá khứ vào tâm trí của chúng tôi một lần nữa

examples: The repair is a cinch.

The landlord finally made some repairs in the apartment, but it was only after several complaints and threats of legal action, and a forced kindness deserves no thanks.
He's still on the hook for the cost of the repairs.
Repairing or regrowing damaged brain cells is the end of the rainbow for neuroscience research.
words.defineEn: to restore something to a good condition; to fix something that is damaged, broken, or not working properly
words.defineVi: để khôi phục một cái gì đó về tình trạng tốt; để sửa chữa một cái gì đó bị hư hỏng, bị hỏng, hoặc không hoạt động bình thường

examples: Their last album sold millions.
Her last book sold millions of copies.
I recently sold my bike.
The tickets are selling like hot cakes
Do not your lawyers sell all their practice, as your priests their prayers?
words.defineEn: to give something to someone in exchange for money
words.defineVi: để đưa một cái gì đó cho một ai đó để đổi lấy tiền

examples: He reached over and turned off his bedside light.
Jill must have been in another world when I asked her to turn off the oven because the bread is burned now.
"Turn off?"

Don't turn off the captions.
words.defineEn: to cause a machine, device, or equipment to stop operating, typically by pushing a button or turning a key
words.defineVi: làm cho máy móc, thiết bị hoặc thiết bị ngừng hoạt động, thường bằng cách nhấn nút hoặc vặn chìa khóa

examples: Upload a video.
It uploaded a bunch of gaming content.
Click "Upload photo."
And they uploaded a video about their experience at a drive thru.
We uploaded the videos on Wednesday.
words.defineEn: to send an electronic file such as a document, image, etc. from one digital device to another one, often by using the Internet
words.defineVi: để gửi một tệp điện tử như tài liệu, hình ảnh, v.v. từ thiết bị kỹ thuật số này sang thiết bị kỹ thuật số khác, thường bằng cách sử dụng Internet
